title: Privilege of presenting bank to deal with goods;
context: ยง490:4A-504 Order in which items and payment orders may be charged to account; order of withdrawals from account. (a) If a receiving bank has received more than one payment order of the sender or one or more payment orders and other items that are payable from the sender&rsquo;s account, the bank may charge the sender&rsquo;s account with respect to the various orders and items in any sequence. (b) In determining whether a credit to an account has been withdrawn by the holder of the account or applied to a debt of the holder of the account, credits first made to the account are first withdrawn or applied. [L 1991, c 41, pt of ยง1]/); am L 1991, c 118, pt of ยง4]
